question: Chattogram port, which was seen in news recently, is located in which country?
explanation:
Union Shipping Minister has recently flagged off first trial container ship from Kolkata Port to Agartala through the Chattogram port of Bangladesh.
This trial run has been done under the Agreement on using Chattogram and Mongla Ports for movement of Indiaâ€™s transit cargo through Bangladesh. It will provide a shorter route to connect the North East Region of India through Bangladesh.
